tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hardware_components_inventory (
    component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(255),
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE hardware_components (
    component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE component_manufacturers (
    manufacturer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    manufacturer_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE component_inventory (
    component_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (component_id) REFERENCES hardware_components(component_id)
)

CREATE TABLE inventory_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50),
    item_description TEXT,
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE item_categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(50),
    category_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE item_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    quantity_change INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE item_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    location_description TEXT,
    capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE hardware_components (
    component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    storage_location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE component_types (
    type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    type_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE component_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_id INT,
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE component_stock (
    stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE component_status (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT
)
